document.full_text: a french warplane destroyed a libyan military aircraft with an air-to-ground missile as it was landing at misrata air base in western libya on thursday, france's armed forces said on thursday.
document.title: french missile destroys libyan army plane on ground
lines_and_colors: a french warplane destroyed a libyan military aircraft with an air-to-ground missile as it was landing at misrata air base in western libya on thursday, france's armed forces said on thursday.
